title: Braves' Profar gets 80-game ban for PED violation
description: Atlanta Braves outfielder Jurickson Profar was suspended for 80 games by Major League Baseball on Monday after a positive test for the performance-enhancing drug chorionic gonadotropin.
author: Alden Gonzalez

title: Pels shut down Zion, McCollum for rest of season
description: The New Orleans Pelicans are shutting down Zion Williamson (back) and CJ McCollum (foot) for the rest of the season.
author: Michael Wright

title: Amorim: Fernandes is not leaving Man Utd
description: Bruno Fernandes will not be leaving Manchester United this summer, says head coach Ruben Amorim - as he can help the club win the Premier League again.

title: Arteta: Saka 'ready to go' and could start against Fulham
description: Arsenal have received a "massive boost" with Bukayo Saka fit and available to start when Arsenal face Fulham in the Premier League on Tuesday, says Mikel Arteta.

title: I've told Fernandes he is going nowhere - Amorim
description: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim says he has told Bruno Fernandes he will not allow him to leave this summer.

title: Haaland to see specialist for ankle injury
description: Manchester City striker Erling Haaland will see a specialist after sustaining a left ankle injury in Sunday's FA Cup quarter-final against Bournemouth.

title: March Madness 2025: No. 1 Texas shuts down Hailey Van Lith, TCU to reach first Final Four since 2003
description: Hailey Van Lith's dream run through the NCAA tournament with TCU has come to an end.
author: Ryan Young

title: Texas reaches first Final Four of women's NCAA Tournament since 2003, beating TCU 58-47
